WorkItem.Description:
Hi there,
 
I just downloaded the Beta 14.1 release and keep getting that bug when I try to edit items (see attached file)
 
Basically it happens when the gems / items window popus up to replace a gem / slot. Sometimes hitting "continue" allow it to continue working, sometimes it does and I have to quit and reload Rawr. Most of the time after a reload it works fine ... for a while.
 
Any hits are welcome :)
